banner.heading: Hi, I'm
banner.name: Molly Su
banner.description: A front-end developer who enjoys solving problems and is passionate about learning new technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I'm Molly Su. I graduated with a bachelor's degree in information and financial management from National Taipei University of Technology.
In high school, I discovered my passion for programming through Visual Basic. During university, I began learning front-end development and was captivated by how quickly ideas could be turned into visual results. Since then, I‚Äôve been deeply interested in front-end development and am committed to continually improving my skills and striving to become an outstanding front-end engineer.

content.0: Maintain and develop the SurveyCake official website.

1.1: Participate in meetings and collaborate with PMs, designers, and marketers to define requirements
1.2: Implement new page designs and integrate APIs

content.2: Fix bugs in the SurveyCake enterprise dashboard

5.1: Learn and use Nivo to create charts
5.2: Implement new pages and integrate APIs

content.6: Learn Git for collaborative development and version control

content.1: Use SiteMinder to manage hotel listings, room types, and pricing
content.2: Build a one-page website using Bootstrap 5
content.3: Create SOPs to ensure workflow accuracy and consistency

stocklight.title: Stock Light ‚ú®
stocklight.subtitle: Senior Project
stocklight.description:
A one-stop stock information platform that uses historical data and statistical analysis, designed as a blessing-themed system. It integrates deep learning to provide users with real-time and intuitive analysis. I was mainly responsible for frontend development and partial UI/UX design, collaborating with the backend team to define API formats and handle integration.

Key features include:

features.0: Fundamental and technical analysis for stocks, along with unique weather correlation analysis.
features.1: AI chatbot: God of Stock Market
features.2: Lighting system: Users select an industry and filter to find promising stocks.
features.3: Stock dashboard: Includes financial ratios, sentiment radar charts, key charts, news, and a GPT-4 chatbot using RAG.
features.4: Watchlist: Users can group and monitor favorite stocks with real-time prices and insights.

mern-ec-website.title: E-commerce Website üõí
mern-ec-website.subtitle: MERN Stack Project
mern-ec-website.description: A full-stack e-commerce site. The frontend allows users to browse products and place orders (no payment integration yet), with order history visible in the profile. The admin backend lets administrators manage products, messages, orders, and view all customer activity.
